DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy VIP™ feature ( available dual chamber Victory® device ) reduce unnecessary RV pacing , determine patient implant SJM pacemaker benefit use VIP™ rather program AV/PV delay .
DOC.brief_title: Reduction Right Ventricular Pacing Using Feature Ventricular Intrinsic Preference ( VIP )
DOC.criteria: Patient implant dual chamber SJM Victory® device VIP™ 1 month ( ± 2 week ) . At time pacemaker implant , VIP™ program `` OFF '' . At time enrollment , patient pace RV ≤ 60 % time . Patient medically stable . Patient evidence complete AV block , ventricular pace would require part patient 's routine management . Patient indicate AF Suppression . Patient persistent chronic atrial fibrillation . Patient unable comply followup visit due geographical , psychological , reason . Patient currently participate another device research study . Patient young 18 year age . Patient pregnant . Patients life expectancy le 12 month .
